headline: Show HN: Tool for freelancers to calculate how much money to set aside
description:
After having been a regular employee for years, I worked as a freelancer for a while. Going into my freelancing life I had no real mental model for how much of the money I earned was truly mine to spend, and how much of it I needed to set aside for taxes, vacations, retirement, and in case I got sick. I modelled this in Excel as best I could and was quite surprised both by how complicated it was to get right, and how much money I actually needed to set aside!

As my girlfriend also started freelancing last year, I decided to turn my Excel sheet into a little program she could use too, and in the spirit of sharing and helping others I would hereby like to make it available to you all too :)

My biggest take-away so far has been that most people dramatically underestimate how much they need to set aside, and forget to plan adequately for getting sick and for retirement.

You can find the tool here: https://howmuch.probsteide.com/

Comments, questions, and suggestions are more than welcome!

I wish you all a happy Easter Weekend!

In case you skipped to the bottom: you can find the tool at https://howmuch.probsteide.com/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 为自由职业者计算预留多少钱的工具
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 為自由職業者計算預留多少錢的工具
description_zh-Hans:
在做了多年的正式员工后，我做了一段时间的自由职业者。进入自由职业者的生活后，我没有真正的心理模型，不知道我赚的钱有多少是真正属于我的，以及我需要留出多少钱来交税、度假、退休，以及万一我生病了。我尽我所能在Excel中建立了模型，并对它的复杂程度和我实际需要预留的钱数感到相当惊讶！我认为这是很重要的。

由于我的女朋友去年也开始从事自由职业，我决定把我的Excel表格变成一个她也可以使用的小程序，本着分享和帮助他人的精神，我也想把它提供给大家：）

到目前为止，我最大的收获是，大多数人大大低估了他们需要预留的金额，并忘记为生病和退休做充分的计划。

你可以在这里找到这个工具：https://howmuch.probsteide.com/

欢迎大家提出意见、问题和建议！

我祝大家复活节周末愉快！

如果你跳到底部：你可以在https://howmuch.probsteide.com/ 找到这个工具。
